products.title: Logitech Extreme 3D Pro
products.description: The Logitech Extreme 3D Pro is a no frills joystick in an already crowded market. There have been complaints that this joystick is plagued with problems and design flaws and has a lifespan of only a few months.

cons.text: Stops functioning correctly after a period of time
This stick looks great for the price,,,lotsa buttons nice shape good base  ,,but unfortunately it looses calibration quickly...good for beginners,,,
Warranty shipping cost more than the product
